ayahs.indonesian: Dengan nama Allah Yang Maha Pengasih, Maha Penyayang.
ayahs.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

ayahs.indonesian: Segala puji bagi Allah, Tuhan seluruh alam.
ayahs.english: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Master of the Day of Judgment.

ayahs.indonesian: Hanya kepada Engkaulah kami menyembah dan hanya kepada Engkaulah kami memohon pertolongan.
ayahs.english: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
Guide us to the straight path—

ayahs.arabic: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
ayahs.indonesian: yaitu jalan orang-orang yang telah Engkau beri nikmat kepada mereka; bukan jalan mereka yang dimurkai, dan bukan pula jalan mereka yang sesat.
ayahs.english: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
